import React from 'react' const Tarefas = props => { const excluir = (alvo)=>{ document.querySelector(`#element${alvo}`).style = "display: none" } return ( <>
  • excluir(props.index)} key={props.index} id={`element${props.index}`} className="list-group-item"> {props.item}
    • ) } export default Tarefas
